data.name: Tiles II - Multiplayer
data.detailed_description:
Tiles II is a minimalist battle royale where you play as a cube, alone against all or in team, where you must conquer as much territory as possible in a giant arena before your opponents!

The game has several game modes:

  • Normal mode
    Challenge your friends on the arena in a limited time, move freely in the arena and avoid other players from eating your territory.
  • Elimination mode
    Compete in a battle royale where players are eliminated as they run out of territories. Will you be up to it of not being eliminated?
  • Contamination mode
    Survivors, run away from infected players and tiles for as long as possible!
  • Power mode
    Fight in a game where all the moves are allowed with the many power-ups!

The game features a customization system, where you can choose mutators to create the game you like, as well as a simple map editor of 128 tiles by 128.

data.short_description: Tiles II is a battle royale in which you must conquer as much territory as possible. Challenge your friends through many game modes and a great customization of gameplay, as well as a map creator to make your own arenas !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No matter
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: No matter
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
